about_the_game:
An ancient civilization where one man 'Wuscar' was treated as a God has fallen. Scientists performed countless experiments on civilians to give themselves these powers with the goal of becoming Gods themselves.
You play as a survivor of these long abandoned testing facilities. Do you have what it takes to escape and free the remaining survivors?

Wuscar also offers a separate Multiplayer experience:
Collect Guns, Power Ups and Character Customization Items to define yourself and your play-style In this fast paced First person experience and discover what it really means to be a God.

Select from 5 different maps including ones Seen throughout the Story Mode and challenge your friends to an unforgettable PVP experience
detailed_description:
Collector's Edition

WUDDAFUK


About the Game

An ancient civilization where one man 'Wuscar' was treated as a God has fallen. Scientists performed countless experiments on civilians to give themselves these powers with the goal of becoming Gods themselves.
You play as a survivor of these long abandoned testing facilities. Do you have what it takes to escape and free the remaining survivors?

Wuscar also offers a separate Multiplayer experience:
Collect Guns, Power Ups and Character Customization Items to define yourself and your play-style In this fast paced First person experience and discover what it really means to be a God.

Select from 5 different maps including ones Seen throughout the Story Mode and challenge your friends to an unforgettable PVP experience

name: Wuscar

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+ x64
  • Processor: Intel/Amd
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia/Amd
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: Best enjoyed with headphones in the dark.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel/Amd
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia/Amd
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: Best enjoyed with headphones in the dark.

short_description: Wuscar is a thrilling FPS Multiplayer experience. Collect weapons, Upgrade your Robotic limbs and become the strongest Wuscar known to man.
